edu.umn.cs.spatialHadoop.nasa

Class AggregateQuadTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umn.cs.spatialHadoop.nasa.AggregateQuadTree

  • public class AggregateQuadTree
extends Object
    Stores a quad tree of values collected from HDF files from MODIS archive.
    Author:
    Ahmed Eldawy

      • build

        public static void build(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
         org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path inFile,
         String datasetName,
         org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path outFile)
                  throws IOException
        Constructs an aggregate quad tree for an input HDF file on a selected dataset identified by its name in the file.
        Parameters:
        conf - The system configuration which can contain user-defined parameters.
        inFile - The path of the input HDF file to read
        datasetName - The name of the dataset to index in the HDF file
        outFile - The path to the index file to write
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error happens while reading the input or writing the output

         DataOutputStream out)

      • merge

        public static void merge(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
         org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path[] inFiles,
         org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path outFile)
                  throws IOException
        Merges a list of aggregate trees (in the same order) and writes an output tree that combines all input trees. Input trees must have been built using on of the build(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration, org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path, java.lang.String, org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path) methods. The merged tree can be further merged using this method.
        Parameters:
        conf -
        inFiles -
        outFile -
        Throws:
        IOException

      • merge

        public static void merge(DataInputStream[] inTrees,
         DataOutputStream outTree)
                  throws IOException
        Merges multiple trees of the same spatial resolution into one tree of lower temporal resolution (larger time) and the same spatial resolution.
        Parameters:
        inTrees -
        outTree -
        Throws:
